overview: Horny nerds Tyler and Ariana can't wait to get laid. With grad one month away and top colleges on the horizon, they just have to avoid super-bitch Jen and her entourage of football goons. When Ariana's lust for revenge takes her all the way to the boys locker room, she has to fuck and suck her way through a series of events, proving that nerds can be bullied . . . but never beat!
tagline: Nerds can be bullied . . . but never beat!
title: Nerds
